name: Classic Demoscene VFX
description:
Some of the classic Demoscene effects you could see back in the 80's/90's implemented in PIC0-8 MODE-3.

Includes:

  • Moire
  • Plasma
  • Fire
  • Tunnel
  • Sin Text Scroller

Total size 1019 bytes (compressed size) as this was created for PICO-1K JAM 2022

Press x/z or any cursor key to move to next effect
